item.title: SCOM Events to Alerts
item.description: More documentation about this and the supporting code will be available shortly.

item.title: Github Hugo Setup
item.description: To build my blog I decided to use Hugo and Github. This was after looking at different options and talking to my friend Dale @ vCROCS.info. This was his recommendation and how he built his blog site. Check out his post about Hugo To begin with I downloaded the Hugo product and installed it on my Windows 10 laptop. I wanted to learn Hugo and build a web site before tackling Github.

item.title: Sample Markdown Code
item.description: This is some mardown examples I wanted to test. I really wanted to find a way to place code in an html page. below ares some samples, including a table of contents. Take a look at the RAM markdown file to see the code that makes this page.
